column4: i need to create an accesspoint and share the internet connection through it, how can i do it? i am connected to internet via eth0
Does a switch fit the bill?
no, i dont have switch or router, actually i just need to connect my my iphone to wifi
So a wireless router will work then. It has a 4 port switch for your wired connections and wireless for the iPhone.
that i know. but the thing is,i am here in this place for 2 days, also  i have done this in windows, i mean ICS through wifi
